sample

Class OwnerScreenController

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.OwnerScreenController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class OwnerScreenController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    There are three tabs in this class's associate screen In one tab Owner can see all the room status, checkin status, payment status. another for creating new user and one for restting the password
    Since:
    2019-09-21
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Romanov Andre, Shafi Mushfique, Stephen Aranda
